casebody.data:
John DOE, et al.
v.
STATE of NC. No. 95P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 26, 2006. William P. Hart, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 21st day of September 2005 by Plaintiff for "Petition for Notice to Hear Appeal As To Time Is Ripe To Do So":

"Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference this the 26th day of January 2006."
